sentences.sContent: As announced earlier this month, the world is at the start of the 2009 influenza pandemic.
sentences.sContent_eng: As announced earlier this month, the world is at the start of the 2009 influenza pandemic.
sentences.sCn: 正如我们在本月初宣布的那样，世界已进入2009年流感大流行初期。

sentences.sContent: WHO will be able to revise its estimate of pandemic vaccine supply once it has the new yield information.
sentences.sContent_eng: WHO will be able to revise its estimate of pandemic vaccine supply once it has the new yield information.
sentences.sCn: 一旦有新的产量信息，世卫组织将能够修订其对大流行性流感疫苗供应的估算。

sentences.sContent: These recommendations are prudent measures which can limit the spread of many communicable diseases and not only the pandemic (H1N1) 2009 virus.
sentences.sContent_eng: These recommendations are prudent measures which can limit the spread of many communicable diseases and not only the pandemic (H1N1) 2009 virus.
sentences.sCn: 这些建议均为审慎措施，可以限制许多传染病，不仅仅是2009年H1N1流感大流行病毒的传播。

remMethod.val: pan (全部) + dem (人民) + ic → 全国人民动起来 → 大范围流行的
